name: Additional Featured Images and Media Uploader Anywhere
author: Andre de Almeida

sections.description: Add additional featured images to any post type and display using either a built in image gallery/slideshow shortcode or by using a single image shortcode. Most plugins or developers use the non Javasript API media uploader, which is notorious for being glitchy and slow. This leverages the not well known WordPress Javascript API to mimic the built in media uploader. Great for end users or developers.
sections.installation:
WordPress Installation

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New.
  2. Search for Core Additional Featured Images and Media Uploader Anywhere.
  3. Install and activate the Additional Featured Images and Media Uploader Anywhere plugin.
  4. Complete required settings in the AFI Settings tab.
  5. Done!

Manual Installation

  1. Upload plugin named additional-featured-images.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Complete required settings in the AFI Settings tab.
  4. Done!
